t: Creo Group Acquires HMS Mfg. Co.
s: February 19, 2025 - Based in Troy, MI, HMS has locations in Youngstown, OH; Little Rock, AR; and Hong Kong. Creo Group's capabilities include blow molding, pressure forming, injection molding, vacuum forming, custom printing/branding, and an in-house resin recycling platform.

t: Creo buys housewares company HMS | Plastics News
s: February 19, 2025 - Creo Group Inc., a manufacturer of packaging solutions and a portfolio company of Mill Point Capital LLC, has acquired HMS Mfg. Co., a designer and manufacturer of organization products and packaging solutions.
